name: turkey sweet potato meatballs
ingredients: Optional mix-ins: diced, cooked bacon and minced jalapenos
steps: In a large bowl, combine the turkey mince, mashed sweet potato, egg, minced garlic, and ground almonds. Mix well.
If using, add in the optional mix-ins such as diced, cooked bacon and minced jalapenos.
Form the mixture into balls, making about 16 meatballs.
Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 74°C, flipping the meatballs once halfway through cooking.
Once cooked, remove from the oven and let them cool slightly before serving.
